solution_line_template: The carton had {total_eggs_in_carton} - {eggs_with_double_yolks} = <<{total_eggs_in_carton}-{eggs_with_double_yolks}={eggs_with_single_yolk}>>{eggs_with_single_yolk} eggs with one yolk.

It had {eggs_with_double_yolks} eggs with double yolks, which added * {yolks_per_double_yolk_egg} = <<{eggs_with_double_yolks}*{yolks_per_double_yolk_egg}={yolks_from_double_yolk_eggs}>>{yolks_from_double_yolk_eggs} yolks.
Thus, there were {eggs_with_single_yolk} + {yolks_from_double_yolk_eggs} = <<{eggs_with_single_yolk}+{yolks_from_double_yolk_eggs}={total_yolks}>>{total_yolks} yolks in the whole carton.
